data.text: @jlo_said @airlines_UK @robertcourts And get rid of the masks on all flights @British_Airways @VirginAtlantic @TUIUK

@jlo_said @airlines_UK @robertcourts Exactly right. Airlines need to take responsibility and do more though, like removing ridiculous mask mandates. You can't move forward while some people keep their foot on the brakes.

@jlo_said @airlines_UK @robertcourts Thanks for everything you are doing. The discriminatory unvaccinated testing is completely unjustifiable when you consider the latest data showing much higher cases per 100k in x 3 vaccinated adults vs unvaccinated. This is not being reported in the press.
https://t.co/02GdWyrf67
@jlo_said @airlines_UK @robertcourts It was awesome flying with @jet2tweets this week. No masks! Happy smiling staff and customers, what a joy 😄

@jlo_said @airlines_UK @robertcourts Thank you so much for all you are doing Julia to try and help get the travel industry back to normal and accessible for all. And an especially big thank you for helping fight the corner for those who chose to remain unvaccinated. ❤️

@geministar444 @airlines_UK @robertcourts Not sure it will happen this week. Definitely working towards it though and there are many of us cross industry working hard to help bring back some normality particularly in a world which needs so much fixing 🌎

@jlo_said @airlines_UK @robertcourts Hoping and praying that the testing and PLF are dropped this week. Follow the example of Ireland, Norway and Iceland. Millions of us want our lives back and to try and get back to some semblance of normality.
